texts.title: Localized Texts
texts.description: Provides the translated values for all localized string properties for one or more locales.

type.title: Revision Type
type.description: revision type: 0 - Insert; 1 - Update; 2 - Delete; -1 - Undefined

customStatusId.title: Job Requisition Custom Status Id
customStatusId.description: the custom status of the requisition

createdAt.title: Created Date
createdAt.description: date on which this record was created

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: user who created this record. For system statuses, this is set to v4admin

modifiedAt.title: Last Modified Date
modifiedAt.description: the date on which the status was last modified

modifiedBy.title: Last Modified By
modifiedBy.description: the user who last modified the requisition custom status. For system statuses, this is set to v4admin

texts.title: Localized Texts
texts.description: Provides the translated values for all localized string properties for a single locales.

locale.title: The locale specified as an ISO 63901 or BCP-47 language code.

default.title: Whether or not the locale is the default locale based on the request context (i.e. user or system)
